images.prompt: A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful, young Japanese female model, radiating an Idol/Gravure aesthetic, posing in front of a large gym mirror. She wears a high-performance, seamless lavender sports bra with delicate ruching detail and high-waisted, sculpting black yoga pants exhibiting a subtle sheen. The fabric clings to her fit, curvy figure – a slim waist and noticeable curves. Her long, straight black hair cascades down her back, catching the bright natural daylight flooding the modern, minimalist gym. She’s holding a smartphone, angled as if taking a mirror selfie, exhibiting an innocent, slightly shy expression. Bokeh blurs the background of high-end fitness equipment & mirrored walls. Shot on Sony A7R IV, 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, showcasing incredible depth of field, ray tracing for realistic reflections, and global illumination for a vibrant, colorful, and intimately cozy atmosphere. Skin texture is flawless yet realistically detailed – visible pores, faint vellus hair.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup
